thread.title: How to reach bhangarh fort from jaipur

author: rooptravel
title: How to reach bhangarh fort from jaipur
text:
India Mike » India Travel » Cities in India » Jaipur » How to reach bhangarh fort from jaipur How to reach bhangarh fort from jaipur # 1 Hi all, i am travelling to jaipur today (16th Oct), will reach around 8pm. I want to visit bhangarh fort early morning (17th Oct morning) like between 7-8 am. Please help me to figure out how to reach there and come back. I have a bus to Jaisalmer on 17th Oct night at 8pm. thanks in advance.
